content.rendered:
Photo by tookapic

This Week in Genesis there’s no new themes (at least that I saw, let me know in the comments below if I missed something!) so I’m going extra deep on the showcase this week and you guys certainly don’t disappoint.

That’s not all though, I’ve also got:

  • more tutorials than you can shake a stick at,
  • a new commercial plugin from Jared Atchison,
  • and Carrie Dils chats with Cory Miller and Pippin Williamson.

Let’s get to it.

Showcase

First up, a gorgeous new site from Jennifer Bourn at inspiredimperfection.com

Did you see? Did you see? My new site is finally live 🙂 I hope you'll check it out… https://t.co/jr4uBFelzB #genesiswp #lifestyleblogger

— Jennifer Bourn (@jenniferbourn) March 13, 2016

Ryan Townley for paperstreetcake.com

Extremely pleased to announce the launch of the new @paperstreetcake website > https://t.co/0uQVbp2saZ < #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/jZpjh5T3uQ

— Ryan Townley (@ryantownley) March 14, 2016

Peter Shilling for cleaversorganic.com.au

New #Genesiswp site live today for Cleavers Organics! https://t.co/lRQkiuHSVS pic.twitter.com/xgc7TmqlKo

— Peter Shilling (@PShilling) March 14, 2016

Katie Rosebraugh with a nice tweak of StudioPress’ Education Pro theme for dellagoacademy.org

Del Lago's new site using the EducationPro theme w/ WP Multi-Lingual plugin. https://t.co/XObJ7S8Lta #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/NiiKkNzLrr

— Katie Rosebraugh (@mskatiegail) March 14, 2016

Robin Cornett for thesoulcareproject.org

Launched this week for @SoulCareProject (#genesiswp): https://t.co/jAfgpuPvsu

— Robin Cornett (@robincornett) March 11, 2016

Showcase regular Shaan Nicol for words.sg

Another day, another #genesiswp website launch! This time for our friends at @wordsbymutant https://t.co/qZ02nTBZvH pic.twitter.com/c8HNdGwl5t

— ChillyBin Web Design (@chillybindesign) March 16, 2016

…and for tvhits.com.au

@TVHits101 have a new site design built on #genesiswp that went live last week – https://t.co/OPl7JEkAaB pic.twitter.com/UGJrFSKCzA

— ChillyBin Web Design (@chillybindesign) March 15, 2016

Cool site from RoadWarrior Creative for wetechup.com

New website for @wetechup launched today! https://t.co/A1d9WJBj1G Built in #WordPress & #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/2LFsPVbPMC

— RoadWarrior Creative (@roadwarriorwp) March 17, 2016

Chris Storm with a new site for the music fans amongst you for jam.buzz

Launched a new #genesiswp site w/ heavy WP-Types @OnTheGo_Systems customization. Like live music? You'll love https://t.co/7QbNnQcb6T

— Chris Strom (@Marketplicity) March 16, 2016

Cre8tiveDiva with a new site for lindsaywaldenphotography.com

I really loved working w/Lindsay on her site. Her images are little pieces of artwork https://t.co/d9hs22tsfR #newbornphotography #genesiswp

— Cre8tiveDiva (@TheCre8tiveDiva) March 17, 2016

Podcasts

On OfficeHours.fm, Carrie Dils chats with Cory Miller and Pippins Williamson on mental health. If you’re feeling burned out in your business this is definitely one to watch.

I am LIVE with @corymiller303 + @pippinsplugins. We’re talking about mental health in #business. Join the convo at https://t.co/xhWDWz31OO

— Office Hours Podcast (@officehoursfm) March 17, 2016

Best of the rest

Christina Arasmo on how to show the last modified date on your posts in Genesis.

Last modified date in your Genesis Child Theme posts #genesiswp https://t.co/mE8U2VkSpK pic.twitter.com/TVPgaPZkQx

— Christina Arasmo (@dropsoul) March 14, 2016

Tonya Mork goes deep on building a custom plugin from scratch (membership required for some videos).

My new lab teaches you how to build a custom plugin from scratch while learning #WordPress, #GenesisWP, PHP, SQL. https://t.co/dPyBYT3J71

— Tonya Mork (@hellofromTonya) March 15, 2016

Sridhar’s as productive as ever with new articles on:

  • Video hero section in Workstation Pro
  • How to change featured image display on single entry pages in Showcase Pro
  • Equal height columns in Digital Pro using matchHeight jQuery
  • Re-creating a website in Genesis – Day 1 + Day 2 + Day 3 + Day 4

Susan Ramsey starts a new Genesis for Beginners’ series on her blog.

I have a #Genesis4Beginners series on my blog to help new #GenesisWP users: https://t.co/QM4NCA9iyv #WordPress #blogging

— Susan Ramsey (@onehappystudio) March 16, 2016

Chinmoy Paul with a tutorial on showing a limited amount of categories in post meta.

Showing limited amount of categories on post meta https://t.co/abVOhA5ugt via @genesisdevelopr #genesiswp

— Genesis Developer (@genesisdevelopr) March 16, 2016

Genesis contributor Jared Atchison launches a new premium WordPress forms plugin – WP Forms – with Syed Balkhi.

Behind the Scenes of WPForms – My New WordPress Plugin https://t.co/M3GRPpzSLN

— Jared Atchison (@jaredatch) March 14, 2016

Plus, Bill Erickson has a tutorial for you on how to connect WPForms to your CRM.

WPForms isn't just for beginners! Here's a dev-focused tutorial showing how I connected my contact form to CRM. https://t.co/UFav1sybrM

— Bill Erickson (@BillErickson) March 16, 2016

Kristie Hill asks ‘who is your favourite #genesiswp designer?’

Who is your favorite #genesiswp designer?

— Kristie Hill (@blogambitions) March 11, 2016

And finally…

Great post from well known Genesis designer Megan Gray on How to Stop Being a Stupid Freelancer. 

How to Stop Being a Stupid Freelancer: An Open Letter to Myself. https://t.co/LHP2SqhtqH

— Megan Gray (@HouseofGrays) March 16, 2016

Boom!

That’s it for this week but if I missed anything awesome please give it a shout in the comments below.

I’ll be back next week with more Genesis fun and frolics.

Have a great weekend.

PS Thanks to everyone that helped ‘The Guide’ reach over 100 likes on Facebook and over 200 followers on Twitter! If you don’t already follow GenesisWP.guide on your social network of your choice I’d be honoured to have you follow us too.

excerpt.rendered: Showcase special; more tutorials than you can shake a stick at and a new commercial plugin from Jared Atchison.
